about_the_game:
It's been getting to you. The hectic, non-stop rush of city life. The endless, amoebic crowds of people surrounding you at every turn and yet somehow making you feel like you're all alone.

As Pedro Bertasso, an urbanite who has just bought an old farm in the countryside, you decide that if you're going to be alone, it's best you're alone with the peace and quiet of nature and honest, hard work.

Well, things didn't go exactly according to plan for Pedro. Some... thing soon disrupts his desired solitude and tranquility.

Build Your Farm

With a selection of various seeds, cultivate a number of crops on your farm. Your modest venture grows together with the fields you tend to.

Put in the work to earn a living and then expand – build up fences and structures, diversify into livestock, invest in upgrades that make harvests an easier time for you.

Face the Haunting

You'll welcome the easier times because they're few and far between. Something is really wrong with the farm and even if the previous owners hadn't hidden this fact from Pedro, they sure wouldn't have been able to explain it.

Come nightfall, strange noises echo from the impenetrable darkness, and it gets worse with each passing day. Their sources soon manifest and get violent. Assemble an arsenal of weapons and fight for your very survival.

Optimize Your Work

Sell ​​your crops at the market and buy new tools and vehicles to optimize your work in the field. Work consistently, balance between your farming efforts and your defenses and soon you'll you'll swap your pitchfork out for a genuine combine harvester.

A Tale of Rural Terror

But this can't go on and running away is just not an option under these conditions. The creatures infesting this land will soon be the end of Pedro if he doesn't figure out what exactly is going on.

Isolated from the rest of the world in a vast open field, you sense there must be something particular amidst the void and carnage, something unholy that's the source of it all...

Explore the Open Field

You must investigate every nook and cranny of the surrounding area if you're to make it. Pedro is bound to be rewarded for his efforts, not just with knowledge but also valuable items.

Discover more about the farm's macabre past and gather resources by exploring the open countryside. 

Unlock New Areas

Buy new areas to expand your farm and gain access to new items and vehicles. But be careful – whatever haunts these parts doesn't appreciate your fighting back. With new fields, you're bound to encounter new fears...

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB / Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GeForce GTX660
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz

short_description: Fields of Fear is a first-person farming horror game set in a cursed countryside. Build, expand, explore, and survive the unholy manifestations that plague this land. If you can make it as a a hard worker and survivor, you might just find out what happened here and how to stop it.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Polish, Turkish, Ukrainian
